column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|
|PTZ 摄像机|TC-H324S|2MP 23×星光红外 PTZ 摄像机，最高可达 1920X1080@30fps，光学变焦 23 倍，智能红外，红外范围 150m，支持人/车分类，S+265/H.265/H.264/M-JPEG，智能监控，无插件，IP66|

column2: Color: 0.001lux@ (F1.5, AGC ON), BW: 0lux with IR
IR Cut Filter with Auto Switch
Horizontal filed of view: 55.8° (w)~3.2° (t)  Vertical field of view: 32.2° (w)~1.8° (t)  Diagonal field of view:61°(w)~3.64°(t)
Pan Manual Speed: 0.1°~80°/s, Pan Preset Speed: 80°/s
Tilt Manual Speed: 0.1°~80°/s, Tilt Preset Speed: 80°/s
Auto/Semi-auto/Manual/Sunny/Natural light/Warm light/Sodium lamp/Incandescent lamp/Locked white balance
7 Dynamic Areas for Both Main and Sub Stream
Saturation, brightness, contrast, sharpness, adjustable by client software or web browser
16x16, 24x24,32x32, 48x48, 64x64, adaptable size, Letters such as Week, Date, Time, Total 5 Regions
Event Input, Event Output, Mask Alarm, Disk Full, Disk R/W Error, IP Address Conflict, MAC Address Conflict, FTP Server Exception
Tripwire, Double Tripwire, Perimeter, Object Abandon, Object Lost,Heatmap,Video Abnormal, Audio Abnormal
Auto store video in SD card when NVR disconnected, and upload video to NVR when resumed connection (Only Support Tiandy ANR NVR)
Built-in Micro SD card slot, up to 512 GB
IP66 , TVS 6000V lightning protection, surge protection and voltage transient protection
17 languages  Simple Chinese/ Traditional Chinese/ English/ Spanish/ Korean/ Italian/ Turkish/ Russian/ Thai/French/ Polish/ Dutch/ Hebraism/ Arabic/ Vietnamese/ German/ Ukrainian
